channel.title: CVE Feed for WebberZone -- Better Search – Relevant search results for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WebberZone -- Better Search – Relevant search results for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2024-29142|2024-03-19T13:16:25.736Z -- WebberZone -- Better Search – Relevant search results for WordPress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WebberZone Better Search – Relevant search results for WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Better Search – Relevant search results for WordPress: from n/a through 3.3.0.
